THE BLEND OF PROBLEM SOLVING AND CREATIVITY REQUIRED TO BUILD ANY NEW APPLICATION IS GREATLY CHALLENGING AND REWARDING. I ENJOY BOTH FRONT END AND BACK END DESIGN AS EACH BRING THEIR OWN UNIQUE HURDLES AND OPPORTUNITIES.

Just A Little Bit About Me

Technology has always been my passion, and it is my firm belief that its purpose is to enhance our lives in the modern age. I started volunteering with my churchâ€™s tech team when I was 12 years old, learning little by little about using audio and video equipment. I immediately loved having the ability to be creative using technology. Eventually I became production director at that same church, overseeing the live production of all weekend services. In college, I studied business management, but after a few years, decided that I would like to pursue web and app development. I attended Coding Dojo in Seattle where I was able to solidify my coding foundation with over 700 additional hours of experience. For the past 2 years, I've been a part of a team at Praxent, where we meet our client's needs by building large scale, intuitive web apps. I will always enjoy learning new technologies, languages, and frameworks and look forward to continuing to advance my skill set in the future.
